snippet.title: The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners | Quest 3 Update Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
The Meta Quest 3 update for The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners is finally arriving on January 16, 2024! With visual enhancements such as dynamic shadows, increased number of on-screen Walkers, and more, the journey through New Orleans has become even more harrowing than before. Whether you're a grizzled veteran or a first time Tourist, take in the improved sights and fight for survival with this new-gen update for the award-winning Saints & Sinners.

The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners is currently available for Meta Quest, PlayStation VR, and PCVR headsets.

https://twitter.com/walkingdeadvr
https://www.instagram.com/twdss/
https://www.facebook.com/WalkingDeadVR
https://discord.com/invite/aC6KMDXgPJ

In The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners, players take on the role of “the Tourist” and must fight for survival in the flooded ruins of New Orleans, surrounded by unending herds of walkers and torn apart by warfare between the remaining survivors. As they explore the world, they will need to scavenge for weapons and supplies, face gut-wrenching choices and fight their way through humans and walkers to uncover a mystery that will determine the fate of survivors in NOLA.

#thewalkingdead #walkingdeadsaintsandsinners #metaquest3 #quest3 #vrgames #vrgaming #vr #vrgameplay #survivalhorrorgaming #horrorgaming
